sense.def:
The whereabouts of a person or thing
je kraj, kjer je določena oseba ali stvar.

seg.quote: I will not give anyone my whereabouts.
We have discovered the whereabouts of one of the paintings.

sense.def:
Izraz
whereabouts
uporabljamo v vprašanjih, kadar sprašujemo, kje natanko nekaj je.

seg.quote: Whereabouts are you going in Yugoslavia?
